name: Last Days of Old Earth
description: Last Days of Old Earth is a rich strategy game set in our far, far future where the sun is dying. Can you command the last noble tribes of humanity as they attempt to survive among the machines and marauding clans?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 32bit Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270 / GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10, 64bit Processor: 3.5 GHz Quad Core Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 290 / GeForce GTX 770 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950
